name: Tower Defender Jet Mech
description:
For Mech Jam III

Defend the tower from a volley of energy blasts!

Detecting an incoming attack from an alien force, you have been sent in a prototype mech to defend the city's wall tower!  Luckily, the alien force only has 150 shots to spend.  But, the mech is incomplete!  You only have access to the jet system and an energy shield, capable of deflecting the shots.

Try to clear all of the shots and only have minimal damage to the tower!

Controls:

Enter/Click: Start game

Space/Click: Ascend

Sound effects made with jfxr by FrozenFractal.
